title: Outliers Mentorship Program
description: Outliers is a new life-long learning community for exceptional student tech builders around the country led by [Ann Miura-Ko](https://floodgate.com/ann-miura-ko/). The objective of this community is to amplify your technical ambition through industry exploration, skill-building, and mentorship. The community is backed by [Floodgate](http://www.floodgate.com/), a top-tier seed-stage venture capital firm located in Silicon Valley with a track record of early investments in companies such as Lyft, Twitch, and Twitter.
